* Editor mode
* User program mode

Editor boot -> branch (user program or editor)

Flash Erase

0xff00 -> 8k ~ 16k

0x00000001 // 0x0000~0x03FF
0x00000002 // 0x0400~0x07FF
0x00000004 // 0x0800~0x0BFF
0x00000008 // 0x0C00~0x0FFF
0x00000010 // 0x1000~0x13FF
0x00000020 // 0x1400~0x17FF
0x00000040 // 0x1800~0x1BFF
0x00000080 // 0x1C00~0x1FFF
0x00000100 // 0x2000~0x23FF
0x00000200 // 0x2400~0x27FF
0x00000400 // 0x2800~0x2BFF
0x00000800 // 0x2C00~0x2FFF
0x00001000 // 0x3000~0x33FF
0x00002000 // 0x3400~0x37FF
0x00004000 // 0x3800~0x3BFF
0x00008000 // 0x3C00~0x3FFF
0x00010000 // 0x4000~0x43FF
0x00020000 // 0x4400~0x47FF
0x00040000 // 0x4800~0x4BFF
0x00080000 // 0x4C00~0x4FFF
0x00100000 // 0x5000~0x53FF
0x00200000 // 0x5400~0x57FF
0x00400000 // 0x5800~0x5BFF
0x00800000 // 0x5C00~0x5FFF
0x01000000 // 0x6000~0x63FF
0x02000000 // 0x6400~0x67FF
0x04000000 // 0x6800~0x6BFF
0x08000000 // 0x6C00~0x6FFF
0x10000000 // 0x7000~0x73FF
0x20000000 // 0x7400~0x77FF
0x40000000 // 0x7800~0x7BFF
0x80000000 // 0x7C00~0x7FFF
